name: SBM COMPANY
goal:
SBM company is a manufacturer of plant protection products for the agricultural and garden markets. SBM is also a distributor of biocide products and fertilizers for the general public.
SBM develop its own solutions for the plant protection sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives: The revision of regulation 1107/2009 and 396/2005 but also the revision of the General Food Law. Mainly any texts (national or european) which may have consequences on biocide or plant protection markets.
